00024 void UdpExchange::Create(int port)
00025 {

00030 void UdpExchange::Disconnect()
00031 {
00032     listUdpConnections.Lock();
00033     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd();
00034         listUdpConnections.Next())
00035     {
00036         delete (listUdpConnections.GetCurrent());
00037         listUdpConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00038     }
00039     listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00040 }
00041
00042 void UdpExchange::Close()
00043 {
00044     Stop();
00045     GetSocket()->Close();
00046 }

00048 int UdpExchange::SendTo(int len, const char* buf, const char* addr, int port)
00049 {
00050     UdpConnection udp_connect;
00051
00052     //REVIEW
00053     /*
00054     udp_connect.addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00055     udp_connect.addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00056     if(!strcmp(addr, ""))  udp_connect.addr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00057     else udp_connect.addr.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(addr);

00059     if ( Socket::FillAddrIn( &udp_connect.addr, addr, port ) == false )

00064
00065 int UdpExchange::SendTo(int len, const char* buf, unsigned int pid)
00066 {
00067     int nb_send = 0;
00068     listUdpConnections.Lock();
00069
00070     UdpConnection* ptr = FindConnectionFromId(pid);
00071     if(ptr)
00072     {
00073         try
00074         {
00075             nb_send = MsgSocket::SendTo(len, buf, ptr);
00076         }
00077         catch( SocketException &e )
00078         {
00079             OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peer %8.8x : %s (%d)\n", pid, e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00080         }
00081     }
00082
00083     listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00084     return nb_send;
00085 }
00086
00087 void UdpExchange::SendToAll(int len, const char* buf)
00088 {
00089     listUdpConnections.Lock();
00090     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd();
00091         listUdpConnections.Next())
00092     {
00093         try
00094         {
00095             SendTo(len, buf, (listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()));
00096         }
00097         catch( SocketException &e )
00098         {
00099             OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00100         }
00101     }
00102     listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00103 }

00105 int UdpExchange::GetNbConnections()
00106 {
00107     listUdpConnections.Lock();
00108     int nb = listUdpConnections.GetNumberOfElements();
00109     listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00110     return nb;
00111 }
00112
00113 UdpConnection* UdpExchange::AcceptConnection(const UdpConnection& udp_connect, bool msg_empty)
00114 {
00115     //std::cerr << "in UdpExchange::acceptConnection(UdpConnection*)\n";
00116
00117     listUdpConnections.Lock();
00118     UdpConnection* udp_found = NULL;
00119     for(listUdpConnections.First(); !udp_found && listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd();
00120         listUdpConnections.Next())
00121     {
00122         if(udp_connect == *(listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()))
00123         {
00124             udp_found = listUdpConnections.GetCurrent();
00125         }
00126     }
00127
00128     if(!udp_found && msg_empty)
00129     {
00130         udp_found = new OMISCID_TLM UdpConnection(udp_connect);
00131         listUdpConnections.Add(udp_found);
00132     }
00133     else if (!msg_empty)
00134     {
00135         OmiscidTrace( "Connection UDP from refused (Unknown, not initialized with empty message)\n");
00136     }
00137     listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00138     return udp_found;
00139 }
00140
00141 int UdpExchange::GetListPeerId(SimpleList<unsigned int>& listId)
00142 {
00143     int nb =0;
00144     listUdpConnections.Lock();
00145     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd();
00146         listUdpConnections.Next())
00147     {
00148         listId.Add((listUdpConnections.GetCurrent())->pid);
00149         nb++;
00150     }
00151     listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00152     return nb;
00153 }
00154
00155 UdpConnection* UdpExchange::FindConnectionFromId(unsigned int id)
00156 {
00157     unsigned int SearchId = id;
00158
00159     listUdpConnections.Lock();
00160     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd(); listUdpConnections.Next())
00161     {
00162         if( listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()->pid == SearchId )
00163         {
00164             listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00165             return listUdpConnections.GetCurrent();
00166         }
00167     }
00168
00169     // By default search for the ServiceId
00170     SearchId = id & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00171
00172     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd(); listUdpConnections.Next())
00173     {
00174         if ( SearchId == (listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()->pid & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) )
00175         {
00176             listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00177             return listUdpConnections.GetCurrent();
00178         }
00179     }
00180
00181     listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00182     return NULL;
00183 }
00184
00186 bool UdpExchange::DisconnectPeerId(unsigned int PeerId)
00187 {
00188     bool ret = false;
00189
00190     // remove all connection from a service !
00191     unsigned int SearchId = PeerId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00192
00193     listUdpConnections.Lock();
00194     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd(); listUdpConnections.Next())
00195     {
00196         if( SearchId == (listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()->pid & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID))
00197         {
00198             delete listUdpConnections.GetCurrent();
00199             listUdpConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00200             ret = true;
00201         }
00202     }
00203
00204     listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00205     return ret;
00206 }
00207
00208 bool UdpExchange::RemoveConnectionWithId(unsigned int pid)
00209 {
00210     listUdpConnections.Lock();
00211
00212     for(listUdpConnections.First(); listUdpConnections.NotAtEnd();
00213         listUdpConnections.Next())
00214     {
00215         if(listUdpConnections.GetCurrent()->pid == pid)
00216         {
00217             delete listUdpConnections.GetCurrent();
00218             listUdpConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00219             listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00220             return true;
00221         }
00222     }
00223     listUdpConnections.Unlock();
00224     return false;
00225 }

00227 void UdpExchange::SetServiceId(unsigned int pid)
00228 {
00229     // Check validity of a service Id
00230     if ( (pid & ComTools::CONNECTOR_ID) == 0 )
00231     {
00232         // pid = pid | 0xffffff01;
00233 #ifdef DEBUG
00234         //              fprintf( stderr, "Warning: ConnectorId could not be 0 for UdpExchange. Value changes to 1 (PeerId = %8.8x)\n", pid );
00235 #endif
00236     }
00237     MsgSocket::SetServiceId(pid);
00238 }
